thread.title: Makeup artist creates 'Stranger Things' and 'Harry Potter' masterpieces on her arm
thread.title_full: Makeup artist creates 'Stranger Things' and 'Harry Potter' masterpieces on her arm

author: Samantha Scelzo
title: Makeup artist creates 'Stranger Things' and 'Harry Potter' masterpieces on her arm
text:
If you're into doing your makeup, or just watching makeup tutorials , you know that you rely on the swatch color to show you what the product will look like on skin. 
SEE ALSO: Instagram rips off yet another feature from Snapchat 
Well, one Instagram makeup artist named Daisy Weigt is taking advantage of this technique and creating complete detailed works of art to show off the beautiful rainbow of colors in her makeup arsenal.
So this was a lot harder than I thought. When I did it in my head, it was so easy. ðŸ˜‚ what's your favorite @kyliecosmetics lip gloss? â€¢ â€¢ â€¢ â€¢ â€¢ #makeup#makeupaddict#makeupjunkie#beautyaddict#beautyjunkie#beautyblogger#bblogger#lipstickjunkie#lipstickaddict#metalliclipstick#instamakeup#instabeauty#mattelipstick#liquidlipstick#fiercesociety#hudabeauty#slave2beauty#vegas_nay#wakeupandmakeup#dressyourface#lipgloss#kyliecosmetics#kyliejenner#kylielipkit#anastasiabeverlyhills#jeffreestarcosmetics#colourpopcosmetics#swatches#kylie#sephora 
A post shared by Daisy (was Beautybydaisyweigt) (@dwglamgeek) on Mar 4, 2017 at 4:45pm PST 
"One time I saw Cady Heron wearing army pants and flip flops. So I bought army pants and flip flops." ðŸ˜‚ This movie is a classic for me. Who else loves this movie? It has so many memorable quotes. What's your favorite quote? Products used @nyxcosmetics "run the world" and @caked.co "jelly" â€¢ â€¢ â€¢ â€¢ â€¢ #makeup#makeupaddict#makeupjunkie#beautyaddict#beautyjunkie#beautyblogger#bblogger#lipstickjunkie#lipstickaddict#metalliclipstick#instamakeup#instabeauty#mattelipstick#liquidlipstick#fiercesociety#hudabeauty#slave2beauty#vegas_nay#wakeupandmakeup#dressyourface#lipgloss#meangirls#anastasiabeverlyhills#jeffreestarcosmetics#sephora#colourpopcosmetics#kyliecosmetics#cakedmakeup#nyxcosmetics#ulta 
A post shared by Daisy (was Beautybydaisyweigt) (@dwglamgeek) on Mar 2, 2017 at 11:53am PST 
Using a wide variety of products, Weigt creates pop-culture inspired looks, proving that there might be another use for all this makeup we're obsessively buying. She's created scenes from Mean Girls, Harry Potter, Stranger Things and more. 
Come on season 2! I need it to come faster!! You think these swatches will get me a job wearing 80's gear as an extra on the show!? ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ that would be a dream!! I came across this illustration from the very talented @wannelle , I got her permission to recreate this look with lipsticks. Who's a stranger things nerd like me!? One of my favorite ones I've done so far! Thank you @wannelle for letting me recreate this! â€¢ â€¢ â€¢ â€¢ â€¢ #makeup#makeupaddict#makeupjunkie#beautyaddict#beautyjunkie#beautyblogger#bblogger#lipstickjunkie#lipstickaddict#metalliclipstick#instamakeup#instabeauty#mattelipstick#liquidlipstick#fiercesociety#hudabeauty#slave2beauty#vegas_nay#wakeupandmakeup#dressyourface#lipgloss#strangerthings#anastasiabeverlyhills#limecrime#jeffreestarcosmetics#kyliecosmetics#colourpopcosmetics#katvondbeauty#netflix#makeupartist 
A post shared by Daisy (was Beautybydaisyweigt) (@dwglamgeek) on Mar 2, 2017 at 4:30pm PST 
A post shared by Daisy (was Beautybydaisyweigt) (@dwglamgeek) on Mar 4, 2017 at 12:51pm PST 
A post shared by Daisy (was Beautybydaisyweigt) (@dwglamgeek) on Feb 25, 2017 at 6:21pm PST 
Whether she uses highlighters, lipstick or eyeshadow, Weigt's designs don't disappoint, each one being cooler than the next:
A post shared by Daisy (was Beautybydaisyweigt) (@dwglamgeek) on Feb 27, 2017 at 5:45pm PST 
I know I barely posted this not too long ago, but who else is excited for the premiere tonight!? Please no spoilers! I'm going to watch it a little later, because I'm still watching the Grammys. But I'm s excited the walking dead is back! @katvondbeauty lipstick in "vampira" and @colourpopcosmetics in "bull chic" â€¢ â€¢ â€¢ â€¢ #makeup#makeupaddict#makeupjunkie#beautyaddict#beautyjunkie#beautyblogger#bblogger#lipstickjunkie#lipstickaddict#metalliclipstick#instamakeup#instabeauty#mattelipstick#liquidlipstick#fiercesociety#hudabeauty#slave2beauty#vegas_nay#wakeupandmakeup#dressyourface#lipgloss#thewalkingdead#trendmood#katvondbeauty#thekatvond#colourpopcosmetics#colourpop 
A post shared by Daisy (was Beautybydaisyweigt) (@dwglamgeek) on Feb 12, 2017 at 6:46pm PST 
Looking through her Instagram is absolutely addicting and her art is definitely #makeupgoals.
Since sometimes we're even too lazy to wash our faces in the morning, these looks are way above our skill level. 
[H/T: Hello Giggles]
